title: League of legends how to annoy - ganking with favouritism
body:
When the jgler has nothing better to do then gank you constantly... takes like 2 jg camps and sits in a bush until you get close for the whole game...

I was in lane against nasus then...

fucking wanker jg

replies.body: So what you didn't learn that he was gonna be sitting there?

Hecurim moves very fast, I knew he was there and I tried to keep my distance but nasus has wither and... you get the idea.

You make assumptions based on no substantial evidence aside from me describing that he was camping next to my lane...
Put your sarcastic "Criticism" to better use next time you cold bastard

"How do i farm under tower?"

Also Deeper wards so your expecting it more.

Ok, I get that idea so it would have been a good idea to ask my jg to ward the entrances to my lane as he goes around jgling... Deep warding.

Doing it myself could end up as a suicidal move.

I know how to farm under tower, barely but nasus farming well is more scary to me then a gank from a 5-0 jax so I kept trying to "push" him away and get him miss cs for it. It was a bad move I know that now...

I didn't mean jax as if he was actually in the game.
just in general
This is a jglers favourite tactic vs nasus just play safe when you don't have wards punish nasus when you do or jg is ganking bot.

But he didn't gank bot until 11:00 whereas I had 6 ganks from him by 8:00
good advice though, it was a pretty abnormal situation for me and I don't think it is likely to happen much in the future (I hope). 

(Btw, I did ward but he then came from a different entrance...)
